name: Fight for the Fuel
description:
(Note: The .zip file includes all of the game versions(windows, mac and linux))

Fight for the Fuel is a Topdownshooter game where you need to kill enemies to get some fuel and unlock the next level. You are a guy that need to pay a Energy Bill, but the bank is very, very far, so everytime you need to stop in a Fuel Station. But in theese Fuel Stations, people are very strange, but you have a gun to protect yourself.

Level 1: Bad Bat Battle

Level 2: Power Situation

Level 3: Cloning your [bad habits]

Level 4: Is this another world?

How to install:

1. Download the file

2. Extract the file

3. Choose your version

3.5. Delete the versions you don't need

3.7. Don't delete the .pck file of your version

4. Play it

4.5. Any Bug, warn me

My Yt channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC926wiai77-ThcvJKkh0PuA/videos
